casebody.data:
Hans Isbrandtsen et al. v. Planning and Zoning Board of Appeals of the Town of Greenwich et al. (10757)

O’Connell, Foti and Lavery, Js.

Argued December 7, 1993 decision released January 4, 1994 Jeffrey J. Mirman, for the appellants (plaintiffs). *923John K. Wetmore, assistant town attorney, for the appellee (named defendant). Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by Leo Fedus & Sons Construction Co. v. Zoning Board of Appeals, 225 Conn. 432, 623 A.2d 1007 (1993).

The judgment is affirmed.
